alert.note: Alert for North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 1:12AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fayette, south central Fulton and northwestern Clayton Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 111 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Union City, or 13 miles southwest of Atlanta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Jonesboro, East Point, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Tyrone, Hapeville, Lake City, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, Turner Field, Cascade Heights, Lakewood Park, Sandy Creek, Sandtown and Conley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
